meanings.sent1: She was disallowing any changes to the plan.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was disallowing late submissions of homework.
meanings.sent3: The cat was disallowing any dogs near its food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The strict rules were disallowing any room for flexibility.
meanings.sent5: The locked gate was disallowing entry to unauthorized personnel.

meanings.sent1: The disallowing sign was clearly posted on the door.
meanings.sent2: The disallowing policy was strictly enforced.
meanings.sent3: The disallowing rule seemed a bit too harsh for the situation.
meanings.sent4: The disallowing decision left many disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The disallowing attitude created a tense atmosphere.
